languages.text: {n}Мужчина указывает на одну из замерших статуй.{/n} "Древние, служители богов. Когда-то они были их великими ратниками, теперь же хранят покой этого мирового погоста и следят, чтобы смертные не покушались на божественный уклад".

{n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина указывает на одну из замерших статуй.{/n} "Древние, служители богов. Когда-то они были их великими ратниками, теперь же хранят покой этого мирового погоста и следят, чтобы смертные не покушались на божественный уклад".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}男は動かない像のひとつを指さす。{/n}「古き者たち、神々の従者。かつては神々の偉大な戦士だったが、今ではこの一般墓地の平穏を守り、人間が神の秩序に挑むことのないよう見張っている」
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は動かない像のひとつを指さす。{/n}「古き者たち、神々の従者。かつては神々の偉大な戦士だったが、今ではこの一般墓地の平穏を守り、人間が神の秩序に挑むことのないよう見張っている」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}这个人指着其中一座静止的雕像。{/n}“它们是古人，是众神的仆人。它们曾是神明的伟大战士，如今守护着这片宇宙墓地的安宁，以防凡人挑战神圣的秩序。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人指着其中一座静止的雕像。{/n}“它们是古人，是众神的仆人。它们曾是神明的伟大战士，如今守护着这片宇宙墓地的安宁，以防凡人挑战神圣的秩序。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}L'homme désigne l'une des statues.{/n} « Les anciens, serviteurs et guerriers des dieux. Aujourd'hui, ils ne font que maintenir la paix sur ce cimetière universel et s'assurer que les mortels n'aillent pas à l'encontre de l'ordre divin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme désigne l'une des statues.{/n} « Les anciens, serviteurs et guerriers des dieux. Aujourd'hui, ils ne font que maintenir la paix sur ce cimetière universel et s'assurer que les mortels n'aillent pas à l'encontre de l'ordre divin. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre señala una de las estatuas inmóviles.{/n} «Los antiguos, los sirvientes de los dioses. Solían ser los poderosos guerreros de los dioses, pero ahora protegen la paz de este cementerio universal y se aseguran de que los mortales no alteren el orden divino».
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre señala una de las estatuas inmóviles.{/n} «Los antiguos, los sirvientes de los dioses. Solían ser los poderosos guerreros de los dioses, pero ahora protegen la paz de este cementerio universal y se aseguran de que los mortales no alteren el orden divino».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann deutet auf eine der reglosen Statuen.{/n} "Die Alten, die Diener der Götter. Sie waren früher die großen Krieger der Götter. Nun hüten sie den Frieden dieses universellen Friedhofs und sorgen dafür, dass Sterbliche die göttliche Ordnung nicht herausfordern."
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann deutet auf eine der reglosen Statuen.{/n} "Die Alten, die Diener der Götter. Sie waren früher die großen Krieger der Götter. Nun hüten sie den Frieden dieses universellen Friedhofs und sorgen dafür, dass Sterbliche die göttliche Ordnung nicht herausfordern."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Adam, hareketsiz heykellerden birini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Kadimler. Tanrıların hizmetkârları. Eskiden tanrıların ulu savaşçılarıydılar. Şimdiyse evrenin bu mezarının huzurunu muhafaza ediyor, ölümlülerin ilahi düzene karşı çıkmasını engelliyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}The man points at one of the motionless statues.{/n} "The ancient ones, the servants of the gods. They used to be the gods' great warriors; now they guard the peace of this universal cemetery and see to it that mortals don't challenge the divine order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam hareketsiz heykellerden birini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Kadimler. Tanrıların hizmetkârları. Eskiden tanrıların ulu savaşçılarıydı, artık evrenin bu mezarının huzurunu muhafaza ediyorlar ve ölümlülerin ilahi düzene karşı çıkmamasını sağlıyorlar."
traits.speaker: Chief
